description: Curated list of high-quality CS course materials from top universities with verified open licenses

universities.name: University of Washington - Paul G. Allen School

courses.title: Data Structures and Parallelism
courses.license: Varies by material - check individual items
courses.note: Some lecture notes may be CC BY-SA, need to verify

verified_open_sources.description: These sources are verified to have acceptable licenses for bulk download

sources.name: OpenDSA Project
sources.description: Interactive data structures and algorithms textbook

sources.name: Teach Yourself CS
sources.description: Curated list of CS resources, many are open
sources.note: Not a content source, but lists many open resources
sources.action: Mine this list for individual open resources

individual_lecture_notes.description: Individual course lecture note PDFs verified to have acceptable licenses

strategy_1.name: arXiv CS Papers Bulk Download
strategy_1.description: Download papers with explicit CC licenses from arXiv CS categories
strategy_1.implementation: Use arXiv API, filter by license field = CC BY

strategy_2.name: DOAB Computer Science Books
strategy_2.description: Harvest all CS books from Directory of Open Access Books
strategy_2.filter: DDC code 004 (Computer Science), license = CC BY or CC BY-SA

strategy_3.name: Internet Archive CS Textbooks
strategy_3.description: Public domain and CC-licensed CS books from Internet Archive
strategy_3.filter: Subject: Computer Science, License: CC or Public Domain
strategy_3.implementation: Internet Archive API with metadata filtering

strategy_4.name: Project Gutenberg Technical Books
strategy_4.description: Public domain technical and CS books
strategy_4.filter: Subject: Computers, all are Public Domain
strategy_4.note: Older content, but all public domain

implementation_priority.reason: Well-structured API, reliable license metadata, good CS coverage
Massive repository, API access, growing CC BY adoption
Huge collection, but needs careful filtering
High-quality individual sources found through research
